[[File:RazorClaw.png|thumb|200px|The Razor Claw]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Razor Claw costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Pal Park]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Sneasel.png|40px]] Sneasel || | Weavile |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
